items.title: Sausage, Ham and Eggs
items.description: Sausage, diced ham and onions over scrambled eggs. Also includes two slices of toast.

items.title: Chicken-Fried Steak Plate
items.description: Chicken-fried steak and two eggs topped with sausage gravy. Also includes two slices of toast.

items.title: Buttermilk Pancakes Plate
items.description: Three buttermilk pancakes served with hashbrowns and two eggs.

items.title: Turkey and Avocado
items.description: Classic turkey and avocado sandwich on whole wheat with mayo, lettuce, tomato and cheese.

items.title: Classic French Dip
items.description: Roasted beef on a grilled hoagie roll with swiss cheese.

items.title: Green Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper.

items.title: Chinese Chicken Salad
items.description: Shredded cabbage, carrot, greens, chestnuts, mandarin oranges, rice wine vinegar, garlic, almonds and spices.

items.title: Beef Salad
items.description: Beef, spinach leaves, garlic, mustard, thyme and blue cheese. Served with a wheat roll.

items.title: Ultimate Greek Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, lamb steak strips, cucumber, red onion, kalamata olives, feta cheese, garlic, lemon, salt and pepper.

items.title: Pack of Skittles
items.description: It's a pack of skittles. We bring it to you un-opened.

items.title: Handful of Dumb Dumb Suckers
items.description: We have a bunch of these leftover from halloween. Getting a butterscotch flavored one is not guaranteed.

items.title: Tap Water
items.description: Fresh flouridated and chloridated water right out of the tap. We'll throw in a lemon slice in to make it palatable.
